name: jtdc
description: JSON Type Definition to TypeScript compiler.

scripts.build: set -e; tsc; npm run rollup; npm run terser; npm run rollup-bin
scripts.rollup: for p in ./lib/validator/runtime.js ./lib/checker/runtime.js; do rollup --external json-pointer --exports named --input $p --file $p --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve --plugin @rollup/plugin-commonjs; done
scripts.terser: for p in ./lib/validator/runtime.js ./lib/checker/runtime.js; do terser --compress --mangle toplevel --output $p -- $p; done
scripts.publish-docs: set -ex; [ -d ./docs ]; [[ ! $(git status --porcelain) ]]; branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); sha=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD); t=$(mktemp -d); cp -R ./docs/ $t; git checkout ghpages; ls -A | grep -wv .git | xargs rm -rf; cp -R $t/ .; git add .; git commit -m "Updated docs ($sha)"; git push; git checkout $branch
scripts.release-docs: set -e; npm run clean; npm run docs; npm run publish-docs

author: Savva Mikhalevski <smikhalevski@gmail.com>
